headline: What NRG Energy (NRG)'s Natural Gas Portfolio Expansion Means for Shareholders
summary: Melius Research recently initiated coverage on NRG Energy, highlighting the company's integrated generation and retail strategy as well as substantial portfolio growth from pending acquisitions and virtual power plant expansion. White & Case LLP also announced that it advised NRG on securing loan funding for new natural gas generation projects, underscoring a focus on grid reliability and growing electricity demand in Texas. We’ll now examine how the addition of 13 GW in natural gas assets...
